scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a bearded man with a halo, dressed in a dark green tunic with gold trim, kneeling on a green grassy area. He holds an open book in his left hand and has a quiver of arrows on his back. To his left, a small lamb with a halo stands. The background consists of a pinkish-red textured wall and a blue sky. The scene is framed by a gold border.
